mapper.select: SELECT PLAN_NO as planNo, PLAN_TITLE as planTitle, PLAN_DESCRIPTION as planDescription, CASE WHEN TRAVEL_START_DATE > SYSDATE THEN '예정' WHEN TRAVEL_END_DATE < SYSDATE THEN '완료' ELSE '진행중' END AS planStatus, SELECT_REGION as selectRegion, TRAVEL_START_DATE as travelStartDate, TRAVEL_END_DATE as travelEndDate, GROUP_SIZE as groupSize, MIN_BUDGET as minBudget, MAX_BUDGET as maxBudget, TRANSPORTRESERVATION_LINK as transportReservationLink, ACCOMMODATION_LINK as accommodationLink, CREATED_DATE as createDate, MODIFIED_DATE as updateDate FROM TB_TRAVEL_PLANNER WHERE PLAN_NO = #{planNo} AND MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo}

SELECT tc.TRAVEL_NO as travelId, tc.PLAN_NO as planNo, t.TRAVEL_NAME as travelName, t.TRAVEL_DESCRIPTION as travelDescription, t.MAP_X as mapX, t.MAP_Y as mapY, tc.CHOICE_ORDER as choiceOrder FROM TB_TRAVEL_CHOICE tc INNER JOIN TB_TRAVEL t ON tc.TRAVEL_NO = t.TRAVEL_NO WHERE tc.PLAN_NO = #{planNo} ORDER BY tc.CHOICE_ORDER ASC
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_TRAVEL_PLANNER SET PLAN_TITLE = #{planTitle}, PLAN_DESCRIPTION = #{planDescription}, SELECT_REGION = #{selectRegion}, TRAVEL_START_DATE = #{travelStartDate}, TRAVEL_END_DATE = #{travelEndDate}, GROUP_SIZE = #{groupSize}, MIN_BUDGET = #{minBudget}, MAX_BUDGET = #{maxBudget}, TRANSPORTRESERVATION_LINK = #{transportReservationLink}, ACCOMMODATION_LINK = #{accommodationLink}, MODIFIED_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE PLAN_NO = #{planNo} AND MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM TB_TRAVEL_PLANNER WHERE PLAN_NO = #{planNo} AND MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo}
